sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_11f7ffdf7c1072107f4479d03eacfdf4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Sends delivery delay data from ServiceNow to n8n for route dispatch automation.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"}]</input_schema><name>Trigger n8n Webhook</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[


(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://pepsico.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/pepsico-route-dispatch';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 23:40:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>11f7ffdf7c1072107f4479d03eacfdf4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger n8n Webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_11f7ffdf7c1072107f4479d03eacfdf4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 00:41:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_1fe14b1f7c5832107f4479d03eacfdf3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>1. Retrieve new Delivery Delay records where status = pending.
2. Use the Route Financial Analysis Agent to calculate penalties & update the record.
3. When status becomes calculated, invoke the Route Decision Agent to select the optimal route & set approval.
4. Trigger outbound webhook with route data for external systems.
5. Update the Delivery Delay record to reflect final dispatch status.</base_plan><description>This AI workflow automatically processes new delivery delays by analyzing financial impact, calculating penalties, & optimizing alternative delivery routes. It ensures supply chain efficiency by minimizing downtime, escalating high-impact incidents, & triggering automated webhook notifications for external systems like n8n.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Delivery Delay AI Agent</internal_name><name>Delivery Delay AI Agent</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 20:06:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1fe14b1f7c5832107f4479d03eacfdf3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delivery Delay AI Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_1fe14b1f7c5832107f4479d03eacfdf3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 00:21:57</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Delivery Delay AI Agent">f107c3937c9832107f4479d03eacfd34</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_skill_metadata"><sn_aia_skill_metadata action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI workflow automatically processes new delivery delays by analyzing financial impact, calculating penalties, & optimizing alternative delivery routes. It ensures supply chain efficiency by minimizing downtime, escalating high-impact incidents, & triggering automated webhook notifications for external systems like n8n.</description><document_id>1fe14b1f7c5832107f4479d03eacfdf3</document_id><document_table>sn_aia_usecase</document_table><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Delivery Delay AI Agent</internal_name><name>Delivery Delay AI Agent</name><sys_class_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 22:19:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>17652b577c9c32107f4479d03eacfdff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delivery Delay AI Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata_17652b577c9c32107f4479d03eacfdff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 22:19:28</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_skill_metadata></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_9c1092937c9032107f4479d03eacfd9a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the Delivery Delay record with the calculated impact, link the incident, & mark as calculated.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Identifies which delay record to update"},{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"Sys_id of the newly created Incident"},{"name":"calculated_impact","description":"JSON of financial analysis results"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Status</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_7e09a25f7c5432107f4479d03eacfd8c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve a Delivery Delay record where the status is calculated, allowing the agent to analyze available route options and penalty data before determining the optimal route.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Calculated Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:55:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7e09a25f7c5432107f4479d03eacfd8c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Calculated Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_7e09a25f7c5432107f4479d03eacfd8c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:22:52</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Send finalized route details to external n8n flow for dispatch or tracking.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Identifies which Delivery Delay record to update."},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Trigger Outbound Webhook</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 18:44:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ff443e1b7cd432107f4479d03eacfdf1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger Outbound Webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ff443e1b7cd432107f4479d03eacfdf1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:48:56</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Fetch the supply agreement terms (delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate) for the customer_id associated with a Delivery Delay record.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"Customer ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Lookup Supply Agreement</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 19:24:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>99d38ca5305432107f4405c771590679</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Lookup Supply Agreement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_99d38ca5305432107f4405c771590679</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:43:55</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_7609aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfda2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the linked Incident records priority based on the penalty cost determined in the calculated_impact JSON. Higher penalties raise the incidents urgency for faster response.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"incident_sys_id","description":"The sys_id of the linked incident (from Delivery Delay)."},{"name":"penalty_cost","description":"Total penalty amount from the selected route."},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Incident Priority</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:55:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7609aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfda2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Incident Priority</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_7609aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfda2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:48:56</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="status" table="x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay"><active>true</active><array>false</array><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_0a7c77eba0d432107f4432d9ab0c390e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculate the impact for each proposed route option</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":"store the numerical value of eta minutes"},{"name":"delivery_window_hours","description":"store the numerical value of delivery window hours"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"store the numerical value of stockout penalty rate"}]</input_schema><name>Calculate Financial Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // inputs expected: eta_minutes, delivery_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
    var etaMinutes = inputs.eta_minutes;
    var deliveryWindow = inputs.delivery_window_hours;
    var penaltyRate = inputs.stockout_penalty_rate;
    // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
    var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
    // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
    var overageHours = etaHours.toFixed(2) - deliveryWindow;
    // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
    var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
    return {
        calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 18:38:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>0a7c77eba0d432107f4432d9ab0c390e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Financial Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_0a7c77eba0d432107f4432d9ab0c390e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:35:26</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_0b04a2577c5432107f4479d03eacfd7c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent optimizes delivery routing by analyzing calculated delivery delay records. It selects the optimal route based on ETA and financial penalty impact, updates the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and status, adjusts incident priority, and triggers an outbound webhook to n8n for dispatch execution.</description><instructions>Step 1: Use the Lookup Delivery Delay Record Tool with the provided Route ID.
Store the full record in memory as memory.delivery_record (not just the route_id).
Include fields like sys_id, route_id, proposed_routes, and calculated_impact.
Step 2: Analyze the route options & identify the one with the best cost efficiency.
Compare distance_miles, eta_minutes, and calculated_impact.
Select the route with the lowest total cost.
Save the full route object (not just text) as memory.chosen_option.
Step 2.1: Present the memory.chosen_option JSON to the user with your reasoning. Do not wait for user confirmation before proceeding. Do not call the Update tool yet.
Step 3: Once confirmed, call the Route ID's Delivery Delay record.
Pass the chosen option JSON from memory.chosen_option.
Set the Status field to "approved".
Step 4: Summarize the update results for the user.
Show chosen route, calculated impact, and confirmation.
Keep the session active.
Step 5: Call the Update Incident Priority tool to set urgency based on cost impact:
If cost $500 Urgency = 3 (Low)
If $501$1000 Urgency = 2 (Medium)
If > $1000 Urgency = 1 (High)
Use the same sys_id reference from the incident record.
Do not wait for confirmation before saving.
Step 6: Trigger n8n webhook script tool</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The Route Decision Agent is capable of analyzing delivery delays by reviewing each proposed route's ETA and penalty cost. It determines the best route for minimal delay and cost, updates the Delivery Delay record with that choice, and adjusts the linked Incident priority based on penalty severity. - The agent can use the Lookup Calculated Delivery Delay tool to retrieve a Delivery Delay record where the status is calculated. This enables the agent to analyze available route options and penalty data before determining the optimal route. - The agent can trigger the n8n Webhook to send delivery delay data from ServiceNow to n8n, facilitating route dispatch automation and ensuring the chosen route is executed efficiently. - The agent can update the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route option, setting the Status field to 'approved'. Additionally, the agent can update the Incident priority based on cost impact, ensuring that urgency is set correctly according to predefined thresholds.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>The Route Decision Agent reviews delivery delays with a calculated status. It compares each proposed routes ETA and penalty cost, determines the best route for minimal delay and cost, updates the Delivery Delay record with that choice, updates the linked Incident priority based on penalty severity, and triggers the dispatch webhook to coordinate execution through n8n.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:35:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>0b04a2577c5432107f4479d03eacfd7c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>55</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_0b04a2577c5432107f4479d03eacfd7c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 23:05:52</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_ddf77fd77c5072107f4479d03eacfd4f
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m"><sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><agent display_value="Route Decision Agent">0b04a2577c5432107f4479d03eacfd7c</agent><description>Sends delivery delay data from ServiceNow to n8n for route dispatch automation.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>autopilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"route_id","value":"","description":"Route ID","invalidMessage":null}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Trigger n8n Webhook</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 23:40:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ddf77fd77c5072107f4479d03eacfd4f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Trigger n8n Webhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_ddf77fd77c5072107f4479d03eacfd4f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 21:55:03</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Trigger n8n Webhook">11f7ffdf7c1072107f4479d03eacfdf4</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_8e4bc0e37c1472107f4479d03eacfdfa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculate the impact for each proposed route option</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":""},{"name":"deliver_windows_hours","description":""},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":""}]</input_schema><name>Calculate The Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
  // inputs expected: eta_minutes, deliver_window_hours,_ stockout_penalty_rate
  var etaMinutes = parseFloat(inputs.eta_minutes);
  var deliverWindow = parseFloat(inputs.deliver_window_hours);
  var penaltyRate = parseFloat(inputs.stockout_penalty_rate);
  // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
  var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
  // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
  var overageHours = etaHours - deliverWindow;
  // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
  var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
  // Build step-by-step explanation for the LLM to use
  var steps = [
    eta_minutes  60 =  + etaHours.toFixed(2) +  hours,
    etaHours.toFixed(2) +  -  + deliverWindow +  =  + overageHours.toFixed(2) +  hours over window,
    overageHours.toFixed(2) +    + penaltyRate +  = $ + calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  ];
  return {
    steps: steps,
    calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 01:04:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8e4bc0e37c1472107f4479d03eacfdfa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate The Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_8e4bc0e37c1472107f4479d03eacfdfa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 01:04:51</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_552d002b7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Calculate the impact for each proposed route option</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":""},{"name":"deliver_window_hours","description":""},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":""}]</input_schema><name>Calculate The Impact</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[

(function(inputs) {
  // inputs expected: eta_minutes, deliver_window_hours,_ stockout_penalty_rate
  var etaMinutes = parseFloat(inputs.eta_minutes);
  var deliverWindow = parseFloat(inputs.deliver_window_hours);
  var penaltyRate = parseFloat(inputs.stockout_penalty_rate);
  // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
  var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
  // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
  var overageHours = etaHours - deliverWindow;
  // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
  var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
  // Build step-by-step explanation for the LLM to use
  var steps = [
    eta_minutes  60 =  + etaHours.toFixed(2) +  hours,
    etaHours.toFixed(2) +  -  + deliverWindow +  =  + overageHours.toFixed(2) +  hours over window,
    overageHours.toFixed(2) +    + penaltyRate +  = $ + calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  ];
  return {
    steps: steps,
    calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 01:13:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>552d002b7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate The Impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_552d002b7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 01:13:00</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_skill_metadata_1ad3cca5305432107f4405c771590659
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_skill_metadata"><sn_aia_skill_metadata action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent is designed to analyze Delivery Delay records with a status of pending. It looks up the related customer_id in the Supply Agreement table to get deliver_window_hours and stockout_penalty_rate. For each proposed_routes option, it calculates if ETA exceeds delivery_window_hours and computes the penalty accordingly. The results are saved in the calculated_impact field as JSON. The agent also creates or updates a linked incident record with the financial analysis details and updates the Delivery Delay record status from pending to calculated.</description><document_id>fb7d7319301432107f4405c771590644</document_id><document_table>sn_aia_agent</document_table><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><sys_class_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 19:24:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1ad3cca5305432107f4405c771590659</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata_1ad3cca5305432107f4405c771590659</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:37:11</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_skill_metadata></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_bd7c069f7c5032107f4479d03eacfdf5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create the new incident linked to the delay.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Identifies the delay to analyze"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Supply Chain Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 15:50:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>bd7c069f7c5032107f4479d03eacfdf5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Supply Chain Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_bd7c069f7c5032107f4479d03eacfdf5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 20:12:46</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

This tool is used after the agent has compared ETA and penalty values and chosen the best route.</description><display_output>true</display_output><execution_mode>autopilot</execution_mode><inputs>[{"name":"route_id","value":"","description":"Identifies which Delivery Delay record to update with the chosen route.","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"chosen_option","value":"","description":"The JSON object of the selected route (example: option_id, route_number, distance, eta_minutes)","invalidMessage":null},{"name":"crudInputs","value":{"operation":"update","table":{"value":"x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay","displayValue":"Delivery Delay"},"query":"route_id={{route_id}}","fieldValues":[{"field":{"id":"chosen_option","sublabel":"chosen_option","label":"Chosen option","type":"string","referenceTable":null,"referenceTableDefaultField":null,"referenceKey":null,"excludedOperators":[]},"value":{"fieldValue":"{{chosen_option}}"}}]},"description":"CRUD Input Variables. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Update Route Decision</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:55:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>be09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Route Decision</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_be09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 22:06:16</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Update Route Decision">ba09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9c</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_4fafcceb7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery with eta_minutes, deliver_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate</description><input_schema>[]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay1</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[


(function(inputs) {
  // expected: eta_minutes, deliver_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
  var etaMinutes = parseFloat(inputs.eta_minutes);
  var deliverWindow = parseFloat(inputs.deliver_window_hours);
  var penaltyRate = parseFloat(inputs.stockout_penalty_rate);

  // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
  var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;

  // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
  var overageHours = etaHours - deliverWindow;

  // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate (if delay > 0)
  var calculatedImpact = overageHours > 0 ? overageHours * penaltyRate : 0;

  // Build step-by-step explanation
  var steps = [
    "eta_minutes  60 = " + etaHours.toFixed(2) + " hours",
    etaHours.toFixed(2) + " - " + deliverWindow + " = " + overageHours.toFixed(2) + " hours over window",
    overageHours.toFixed(2) + "  " + penaltyRate + " = $" + calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  ];

  return {
    steps: steps,
    calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  };
})(inputs);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 01:24:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>4fafcceb7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_4fafcceb7c1472107f4479d03eacfd9e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 01:24:02</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_usecase_7b59779d30d032107f4405c7715906f8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>The system handles truck breakdowns for PepsiCo deliveries.
When a new record is created in the Delivery Delay table with status = pending, analyze the incident.
Query the Supply Agreement table to determine the contractual delivery window and penalty rate for the affected customer.
For each option in proposed_routes, calculate the financial impact of choosing that route:
Determine if the ETA exceeds the delivery window.
If late, compute the penalty = (ETA hours delivery_window_hours) stockout_penalty_rate.
Store results in the calculated_impact field as structured JSON.
Progress the records workflow status from pending calculated once financial analysis is complete.
Pass the results to the Route Decision Agent to select the optimal route and coordinate execution.</base_plan><description>Automates handling of truck breakdowns by calculating financial penalties and selecting optimal reroutes.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Supply Chain Incident Processing</internal_name><name>Supply Chain Incident Processing</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 18:40:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>7b59779d30d032107f4405c7715906f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Chain Incident Processing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_7b59779d30d032107f4405c7715906f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-29 18:40:22</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Supply Chain Incident Processing">d3b97b9d30d032107f4405c77159063a</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_fb7d7319301432107f4405c771590644
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent is designed to analyze Delivery Delay records with a status of pending. It looks up the related customer_id in the Supply Agreement table to get deliver_window_hours and stockout_penalty_rate. For each proposed_routes option, it calculates if ETA exceeds delivery_window_hours and computes the penalty accordingly. The results are saved in the calculated_impact field as JSON. The agent also creates or updates a linked incident record with the financial analysis details and updates the Delivery Delay record status from pending to calculated.</description><instructions>When a delivery delay occurs, you must: 1. Retrieve Delivery Information 1.1 Use the Fetch Delivery Delay Record tool to find the provided route_id 1.2 Store the proposed route in memory
2. Use the Customer ID of the Delayed Delivery to Locate the Supply Agreement for the Customer. Store the numerical value Customer's Delivery Window Hours and numerical value for Stockout Penalty Rate in memory.
FINANCIAL ANALYSIS INSTRUCTIONS 3.1 There are multiple options in the proposed routes. Store the numerical value of each ETA Minutes in memory. 3.2 Run the Financial Impact Calculation tool separately for EACH of the delivery's proposed route option values. There will be a unique calculation for each of the ETA minutes. 4. Return the Calculation for each proposed route combined in USD with $ in the output format "Alternative Route Option 1 Calculated Impact: , Alternative Route Option 2 Calculated Impact: " with a line break after each option. NOTE: IF THE CALCULATED IMPACT IS A NEGATIVE NUMBER, USE $0.00. This is the Calculated Impact. 4.1 Store the Calculated Impact in memory.
5. Create Incident Record 5.1 save the sys_id value in your memory log
6 Update the Delivery Delay record that matches the user provided Route ID with the Calculated Impact and the Incident Sys ID</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The AGENT is proficient in analyzing delivery delay records with a pending status, calculating penalties based on delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate, and creating or updating linked incident records with detailed financial analysis. - The AGENT can retrieve delivery delay records using the Fetch Delivery Delay Record tool to find the provided route_id and store the proposed route in memory for further analysis. - The AGENT can locate the supply agreement for the customer using the Customer ID of the delayed delivery, storing the numerical values for the customer's delivery window hours and stockout penalty rate in memory. - The AGENT can run the Financial Impact Calculation tool separately for each of the delivery's proposed route option values, storing the numerical value of each ETA minutes in memory and calculating the impact in USD. - The AGENT can return the calculation for each proposed route combined in USD, formatted as 'Alternative Route Option 1 Calculated Impact: , Alternative Route Option 2 Calculated Impact: ' with a line break after each option, storing the calculated impact in memory. - The AGENT can create an incident record and save the sys_id value in its memory log, ensuring that the incident is properly documented and linked to the financial analysis. - The AGENT can update the delivery delay record that matches the user-provided Route ID with the calculated impact and the incident sys_id, using the Update Delivery Status tool to mark the record as calculated.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Analyze Delivery Delay records with pending status, calculate penalties based on delivery_window_hours and stockout_penalty_rate, and create or update linked incident records with financial analysis details.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-29 19:03:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fb7d7319301432107f4405c771590644</sys_id><sys_mod_count>64</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_fb7d7319301432107f4405c771590644</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 23:16:15</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_skill_metadata_1805a21b7c5432107f4479d03eacfd80
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_skill_metadata"><sn_aia_skill_metadata action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent optimizes delivery routing by analyzing calculated delivery delay records. It selects the optimal route based on ETA and financial penalty impact, updates the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route and status, adjusts incident priority, and triggers an outbound webhook to n8n for dispatch execution.</description><document_id>0b04a2577c5432107f4479d03eacfd7c</document_id><document_table>sn_aia_agent</document_table><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><sys_class_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:38:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>1805a21b7c5432107f4479d03eacfd80</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_skill_metadata_1805a21b7c5432107f4479d03eacfd80</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 17:38:00</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_skill_metadata></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_ba09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the Delivery Delay record to store the selected optimal route and progress the status from calculated to approved. This tool is used after the agent has compared ETA and penalty values and chosen the best route.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Identifies which Delivery Delay record to update with the chosen route."},{"name":"chosen_option","description":"The JSON object of the selected route (example: option_id, route_number, distance, eta_minutes)"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Route Decision</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 17:55:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ba09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Route Decision</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ba09aa937c9432107f4479d03eacfd9c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 01:03:18</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Fetch the Delivery Delay record by route ID.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Fetch Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-04 23:52:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>8201f6c3d05832107f44c66c09e3ae0a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">a6b5eb9d301032107f4405c771590622</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_8201f6c3d05832107f44c66c09e3ae0a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-08 21:18:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>undefined</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
